text: I love this game so much. It's not my favourite game, but I think it's the only game that's ever brought out genuine emotion in me, other than a sense of being a badass/fighting against impossible odds/any other videogame cliche. It's not my favourite game, but it is the best one I've ever played, if that makes any sense.

author: Corshba

text: @GameBeatenakaKevinS Earthbound has not been released on the virtual console because there was too many copyrighted songs and Beatles references on it. In order for Nintendo to release the game they would have to change way too much of it, then re-release it; something that the game developers could not be bothered to do. As for Mother 3 being released outside of Japan, they didn't think it'd sell enough copies outside of Japan.
